title: Module 1: ROS 2 Fundamentals
learningOutcomes: Understand ROS 2 architecture and core concepts
Create and manage ROS 2 nodes, topics, services, and actions
Build multi-node robotic systems with proper communication patterns
capstoneIntegration: Provides the communication layer and middleware foundation for the autonomous humanoid system

title: Module 2: Digital Twin Simulation
learningOutcomes: Set up and configure Gazebo simulation environments
Integrate Unity ML-Agents for reinforcement learning
Test robotic systems in simulated environments before physical deployment
capstoneIntegration: Enables safe testing and validation of navigation and manipulation behaviors in simulation

title: Module 3: NVIDIA Isaac Sim
learningOutcomes: Deploy NVIDIA Isaac Sim for high-fidelity robot simulation
Implement perception pipelines using camera and lidar sensors
Develop object detection and pose estimation systems
Integrate Isaac Sim with ROS 2 for seamless workflow
capstoneIntegration: Provides the perception pipeline for environment sensing and object recognition in the humanoid system

title: Module 4: Vision-Language-Action Models
learningOutcomes: Understand VLA model architecture and applications in robotics
Integrate VLAs for natural language task understanding
Implement humanoid robot control with VLA decision-making
Complete capstone project integrating all modules
capstoneIntegration: Provides high-level decision-making and task planning for the autonomous humanoid based on natural language commands
